005
006package gov.nist.secauto.oscal.tools.cli.core.utils;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.yaml.YAMLFactory;
010
011import net.sf.saxon.TransformerFactoryImpl;
012
013import org.w3c.dom.Document;
014
015import java.io.File;
016import java.io.IOException;
017import java.io.OutputStream;
018import java.nio.file.Files;
019
020import javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory;
021import javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException;
022import javax.xml.transform.OutputKeys;
023import javax.xml.transform.Transformer;
024import javax.xml.transform.TransformerException;
025import javax.xml.transform.dom.DOMSource;
026import javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamResult;
027
028import org.xml.sax.SAXException;
029
030import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
031
032/**
033 * Utility class for pretty-printing output files in various formats.
034 * <p>
035 * This class was originally contributed by Mahesh Kumar Gaddam (ermahesh) in
036 * <a href="https://github.com/usnistgov/oscal-cli/pull/295">PR #295</a>.
037 * </p>
038 */
039public final class PrettyPrinter {
040
041  private PrettyPrinter() {
042    // prevent instantiation
043  }
044
045  /**
046   * Pretty-prints a JSON file in place.
047   *
048   * @param file
049   *          the JSON file to pretty-print
050   * @throws IOException
051   *           if an I/O error occurs
052   */
053  public static void prettyPrintJson(@NonNull File file) throws IOException {
054    ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper();
055    Object obj = mapper.readValue(file, Object.class);
056    mapper.writerWithDefaultPrettyPrinter().writeValue(file, obj);
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Pretty-prints a YAML file in place.
061   *
062   * @param file
063   *          the YAML file to pretty-print
064   * @throws IOException
065   *           if an I/O error occurs
066   */
067  public static void prettyPrintYaml(@NonNull File file) throws IOException {
068    ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper(new YAMLFactory());
069    Object obj = mapper.readValue(file, Object.class);
070    mapper.writerWithDefaultPrettyPrinter().writeValue(file, obj);
071  }
072
073  /**
074   * Pretty-prints an XML file in place.
075   *
076   * @param file
077   *          the XML file to pretty-print
078   * @throws IOException
079   *           if an I/O error occurs
080   * @throws ParserConfigurationException
081   *           if a DocumentBuilder cannot be created
082   * @throws SAXException
083   *           if any parse errors occur
084   * @throws TransformerException
085   *           if an error occurs during transformation
086   */
087  public static void prettyPrintXml(@NonNull File file)
088      throws IOException, ParserConfigurationException, SAXException, TransformerException {
089    Document doc = DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance()
090        .newDocumentBuilder().parse(file);
091
092    TransformerFactoryImpl transformerFactory = new TransformerFactoryImpl();
093    Transformer transformer = transformerFactory.newTransformer();
094    transformer.setOutputProperty(OutputKeys.INDENT, "yes");
095
096    try (OutputStream out = Files.newOutputStream(file.toPath())) {
097      transformer.transform(new DOMSource(doc), new StreamResult(out));
098    }
099  }
100}
